about_the_game:
“Diatribes” is a poetic VR interactive narrative that explores the internal conflicts surrounding climate change. In a 15-20 minute experience, players navigate a surreal mindspace filled with distractions and emotional turmoil. This dynamic world transforms based on your emotional state—sometimes inviting contemplation through meditative tasks, while at other times thrusting you into a high-stakes gauntlet between Nature and Civilization.

As you journey through diverse landscapes, you’ll unlock ancient myths and receive guidance from a therapeutic companion. The experience intertwines personal reflection with broader climate issues, encouraging players to confront their anxieties and envision a hopeful future.

Key Features:

  • Interactive Narrative: A deeply engaging story that encourages personal reflection.

  • Dynamic Environments: Settings that change to reflect different emotional states, from serene to chaotic.

  • Meditative Tasks: Calming activities that foster introspection and peace.

  • Ancient Myths & Modern Insights: Timeless narratives that resonate with contemporary challenges.

  • Therapeutic Guide: A unique companion providing perspective and support.

“Diatribes” invites players to engage emotionally with climate realities, discovering personal agency amid uncertainty. Can you navigate the distractions and find a path forward?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD 400 series equivalent or better
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR SDK, Meta Quest 2 and later Meta headsets. Touch Controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 Series* / AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR SDK, Meta Quest 2 and later Meta headsets. Touch Controllers

short_description: "Diatribes" is a poetic VR interactive experience that explores the internal conflicts that arise when we’re confronted with the reality of climate change.
